title: I'd rather read the prompt
author: claytonwramsey
aiHeadline: AI models are so lazy, they'd rather read the prompt than actually do the work—just like you when you skip reading the instructions.

title: Design for 3D-Printing
author: q3k
aiHeadline: 3D printing: because who needs actual results when you can have overhyped promises and failed prints? Just like your diet, but with plastic.

title: What went wrong with wireless USB
author: goldenskye
aiHeadline: Wireless USB: the tech that proved that sometimes, wires are better—because at least they don't randomly stop working mid-transfer.

title: An Alabama landline that keeps ringing
author: bookofjoe
aiHeadline: An Alabama landline that keeps ringing: because apparently, some phones refuse to die, even when everyone else has moved on to video calls and emojis.

title: Oberon Pi
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Oberon Pi: because sometimes, you just want to relive the '90s with a computer that's slower than your microwave—seriously, it's a thing.
